TopicTitle: Stage/Docking mode input settings not saving

Articles.Content:
Version: 1.0.4 Steam

OS: Windows 10 64bit

I discovered this on a modded install, but it persisted on a fresh vanilla install and even when deleting settings.cfg to generate a new settings file. The problem is that whenever I try toggling any of the 'mode' buttons for an input, it will revert to it's original setting after closing and reopening that box. This even happens after clicking 'apply,' or when trying to change the setting for default control like the WSAD keys.

I've tried this on two different computers running the same OS and game version, still had the same problem.

Yeah it's another bug in the controller binding code, if you just change the stage/dock modes without binding a key it won't save the change, you have to rebind the key as well even if it is to the same key.

I thought that might be it! I was playing around with that while troubleshooting and I couldn't figure out why it would work sometimes but not all the time, but I just figured it out. Apparently you have change the mode settings first and then rebind the input after that in order for it to stay. I was trying rebind it first and then change the setting which doesn't work. Thanks for the help
